name: Storm approaching the airship
prompt:
# TTRPG Asset Generation Prompt

## Core Structure
[Asset Type: scene]
[Game System: D&D 5e]
[Intended Use: VTT and Print reference]

## Detailed Description
Subject: Atmospheric scene â€” Storm approaching the airship
Environment: clear narrative focal point, atmospheric VFX support, cinematic light shaping
Style: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), unified painterly collection style, grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, skyward romantic realism, cloudstone and brass, wind-swept forms, airship motifs, cinematic atmosphere
Technical Requirements: aspect 1:1, resolution 1024x1024
Palette: navy, gold, cloud-white, warm sun highlights


## Visual Specifications
- Lighting: cinematic light shaping
- Detail Level: high detail for zoom, simplified for overview
- Composition: rule of thirds with clear focal points and visual flow

## Practical Considerations
- Must be readable at intended viewing size
- Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words or letters.
- Avoid embedded text unless specified; prefer iconography and numbered pins

## Negatives
- nonsense text, watermarks, captions, signatures, artist names; modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare; overly sexualized or glamorized portrayal

Think deeply about creating an asset that enhances gameplay immersion while maintaining practical usability for TTRPG sessions.
